oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US Model 1858 tin canteen
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: US model 1858 smoothside canteen with original cotton webbing strap. Used by Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood, Co. D, 43rd Wisc. Infantry Regiment, USA. Atwood witnessed the battle of Johnsonville, Tenn. Nov. 4, 1864. Atwood's regiment was part of the permament garrison at Johnsonville, Tenn. on the Tennessee River. Johnsonville was a major supply depot for the Federal Armies operating in Tennessee, Alabama, and Georgia in 1864.
